refreshLife: Do you want to get 50 extra health points?
replaceCharacterTitle: Would you like to start a new life?
replaceCharacterStart:
Start (This will remove 
the previous life)
intro_text_1: My last day at office actually started perfectly.
intro_text_4: Not to my surprise, she fired me in the afternoon!
intro_text_5: At last I had my boyfriend for comfort. But then...
intro_text_7: I returned home to fall into my long depression.
intro_text_8: But then I saw my photos from my childhood hometown and got a whole new idea...
intro_text_9: Unicoville! Wait for me! I will leave this city and my terrible memories with it forever...
watch_video: Would you like to watch video?
notificationtext_1: You can buy one more furniture for your house!
notificationtext_2: You have so much to discover, start a new life and see!
notificationtext_3: Someone got past your character at the leaderboards!
notificationtext_4: It is a great time to start a new life!
notificationtext_5: Start a new life and become a cultist!
notificationtext_6: Start a new life and see what happens when you live over 100 years!
notificationtext_7: Start a new life and help people in need!
daily_task_notification_text_1:
Your daily task is ready. 
 Complete and get your reward!
achievementTexts_26: Die as a true neutral with 0 karma.
achievementTexts_53: Turn a cult into a good organization.
achievementTexts_63: Find the lost city of Atlantis.
achievementTexts_67: Become a Grand General in the army.
achievementTexts_69: Get 7 best friends and have a party.
achievementTexts_71: Play the Ghost in a Hamlet play.
achievementTexts_72: Become a Bokemon card game master.
achievementTexts_83: Work at Unico Studio as a developer.
story1Desc: Meredith's biggest dream is to go to space. But she was born to a poor family and no one believes in her ambitions.
story2Desc: Jeff's father was murdered by some thugs before he was born. He wants to become a police officer to bring his father's killers to justice.
story3Desc: Jackie was cursed by a witch while her mother was pregnant. Play her story to see how she embraces her magical powers and rule a cult.
story5Desc: Born in a prison, Zoey wants to continue where her mother left off. But she doesn't want her hands get dirty. So she will be a hacker.
story6Desc: Jason doesn't like to work and wants to make big money in an easy way. Will it really be that easy?
hp0_text_0: Your health dropped to 0 and you died.
h0_text_0: Your heart stopped working due to extreme sadness.
getOld_text_0: You are getting old. Your health will start deteriorating.
welcome_text_0: Your character is now a baby! Grow up by picking one of the 4 choices each year. Each choice has serious effects on the character's life.
refresh_text_0: If you want to see a different set of 4 choices, tap to the refresh button in the middle to get a new set. There are so many more choices than the initial four.
age21Tutorial_text_0: You can earn money various ways, but getting into certain careers unlock new choices. There are dozens of careers to get into.
age21Tutorial_text_1: For example; you need to get some shady friends in order to get the choice of joining to the mafia. Also you need to finish college to get into medical school.
hpLow_text_0: Watch out! Your HP is below 20, your character will die if it drops to 0.
jackieDeathMessage: You reached to the age of 60 and suddenly died because of your curse.
popupAchiements1: You completed an achievement! Complete these achievements to earn extra gems!
esya1_text_0: We must renovate the houses to rebuild the city. The first item is for free, buy it now!
esya2_text_0: Renovate the houses to fill this bar and earn extra rewards.
esya3_text_0: This house is bigger and can have more furnitures. Collect Life Points to unlock bigger houses.
esya4_text_0: There are 2 rooms. Tap on them to change the room.
meslek1_text_0: Congratulations! You got a new job. Extra choices related to the job are unlocked. Try to pick the job related choices to advance.
popupLeaderboards1: Here you can compete against other players in various leaderboards.
maskot_2_text_0: Use these frames to bring new people to Unicoville.
maskot_3_text_0: Congratulations, you have earned enough Life Points to unlock the 2nd house. Let's do that!
maskot_4_text_0: You must continue playing the life you started in order to progress.
maskot_5_text_0: You can move-in new residents to the houses to keep earning Life Points and to continue Luna's story.
task1_text_0: You must complete these tasks to earn Life Points. Life Points are used to unlock bigger houses.
task2_text_0: You must claim the completed tasks to get the rewards. You always have 3 tasks active.
youHaveALover_text_0: You have a lover! Increase your relationship and get married!
youAreMarried_text_0: Congratulations! You are married! If you have enough happiness and relationship, you can make a baby with them!
father_death_text_0: Your dad has past away! You will miss him.
mother_death_text_0: Your mom has past away! It really hurt your heart.
lover_death_text_0: Your lover has past away! It brought down your mood.
popupDeath1_text_0: This character's life has ended. Their life summary is on the gravestone.
popupDeath2_text_0: It shows this character's score. Get higher scores to climb up the leaderboards.
popupDeath3_text_0: You must start new lives to achieve everything and unlock all of the houses. Let's go!
college1_text_0: Congrats! You are a college student now! You can unlock new career options if you complete 4 years of classes.
popupStoryCustom_text_0: There are 2 kinds of lives: Custom and Story.
popupStoryCustom_text_1: In a Custom Life, you pick a character and you are free to do whatever you want.
popupStoryCustom_text_2: In a Story Life, you start with a pre-defined character and you must complete their life quests.
story_task_1_text_0: You can check out this character's story summary and quests on this page.
questCompleted0: You couldn't complete any story quests. You can always try again. Try to follow the character's story and pick the relevant choices.
questCompletedSome: You couldn't complete all of the story quests. You can always try again to complete the remaining quests.
questCompletedAll: Congratulations! You completed all of the quests for this story. Try to complete the other stories now.
tutorial_life1_text_0: Pick one of the 4 choices to continue.
tutorial_storyadvance1_text_0: Add new people and complete their lives to continue Luna's story.
tutorial_progressbarpopup1_text_0: Complete lives to progress Luna's story.
show_first_frame_text_0: Click on this frame to start a life.
daily_task_button_text_0:
Your daily tasks are here. 
You can get more gems by completing them!
exit_popup_desc: Are you sure you want to quit?
shop_close_ad_popup_note: *You'll get your reward when you re-open the game after install the target game.
dailyTaskTexts_2: Accumulate more than $1000 with a new character.
dailyTaskTexts_3: Get one of your skills above 50 with a new character.
dailyTaskTexts_5: Complete a life with more than 250 good karma.
dailyTaskTexts_6: Complete a life with more than 250 evil karma.
dailyTaskTexts_7: Customize your house with an item.
dailyTaskTexts_18: Accumulate more than $2500 with a new character.
dailyTaskTexts_19: Accumulate more than $5000 with a new character.
dailyTaskTexts_20: Get one of your skills to 100 with a new character.
dailyTaskTexts_24: Drop happiness below 25 with a new character.
graveyardText_11: You lived a life of luxury.
graveyardText_12: You were a succesful treasure hunter.
graveyardText_13: You were an important social media icon.
graveyardText_15: You got married to a lovely partner.
graveyardText_20: You found a cure for cancer.
graveyardText_22: You harmed people as a doctor.
graveyardText_23: You were a honorable police chief.
graveyardText_24: You saved many lives as a superhero.
graveyardText_25: You saved the earth from aliens.
graveyardText_32: You were a truly neutral person.
graveyardText_34: You knew how to cook great meals.
graveyardText_35: You lived an extremely long life.
graveyardText_36: Your parents did not like you very much.
graveyardText_38: Your child loved you as a parent.
graveyardText_44: You summoned Dark Lord and ruined the world.
graveyardText_45: You converted your cult to goodness.
graveyardText_46: You were a master of chess.
graveyardText_47: You traveled a lot and wrote about it.
graveyardText_49: You opened your own law firm.
graveyardText_50: You fought for a better legal system.
meredith_astronaut_quest_graveyardText: You realized your dreams and became an astronaut.
meredith_astronaut_quest_fail_graveyardT: You failed to realize your dreams of becoming an astronaut.
meredith_mars_quest_graveyardText: You became one of the first astronauts to land on Mars.
meredith_mars_quest_fail_graveyardText: You could not go to Mars.
meredith_aliens_quest_graveyardText: You met with some aliens and talked with them.
meredith_aliens_quest_fail_graveyardText: You could not meet any aliens in your life.
meredith_signal_quest_graveyardText: You decoded radio signals to detect aliens.
meredith_signal_quest_fail_graveyardText: You couldn't decoded the radio signals.
meredith_message_quest_graveyardText: You've learned what lies behind aliens' message.
meredith_message_quest_fail_graveyardTex: You couldn't figure out what lies behind alien's message.
jeffrey_shampone_quest_graveyardText: You managed to put an end to Al Shampone's crime spree.
jeffrey_shampone_quest_fail_graveyardTex: Al Shampone could not be stopped.
jeffrey_cookie_quest_graveyardText: You succesfully stopped the Cookie Gang.
jeffrey_cookie_quest_fail_graveyardText: You failed to stop the Cookie Gang.
jeffrey_sign_quest_graveyardText: Agent Smith gave you his autograph.
jeffrey_sign_quest_fail_graveyardText: You failed to get Agent Smith's autograph.
jeffrey_eddiebaddie_quest_graveyardText: You defeated Eddie Baddie and took your father's revenge.
jeffrey_eddiebaddie_quest_fail_graveyard: You could not defeat Eddie Baddie.
jackie_scarletcult_quest_graveyardText: You managed to become a member of the Scarlet Cult.
jackie_scarletcult_quest_fail_graveyardT: The Scarlet Cult did not accept you.
jackie_darkmagic_quest_fail_graveyardTex: You did not learn the Dark Magic.
jackie_donsorcerio_quest_fail_graveyardT: You failed to defeat Don Sorcerio.
jackie_genie_quest_graveyardText: You have obtained the soul of a genie.
spice_tame_quest_graveyardText: You tamed a human. You're proud of her.
spice_tame_quest_fail_graveyardText: Born as a cat, lived like a dog. You could've done better.
spice_matt_quest_graveyardText: You saved Alice from Matt. She deserves better.
spice_matt_quest_fail_graveyardText: You regret leaving Alice with Matt
zoey_hacknight_quest_fail_graveyardText: You always regret not to joining a hack night.
zoey_family_drama_quest_fail_graveyardTe: You failed to reveal your father's secret.
zoey_freemother_quest_graveyardText: You freed you mother from prison.
zoey_operation_quest_graveyardText: You made history with your epic hacking
zoey_operation_quest_fail_graveyardText: You couldn't achieve an epic hacking
jason_coin_quest_fail_graveyardText: You couldn't make your own coin.
jason_analyst_quest_fail_graveyardText: You couldn't become a famous analyst.
age125PopupMessageText: You got too old and died.
vipPanel_disclaimer: Weekly Premium automatically renews for {2} per week. Payment will be charged to your {0} account. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and turn off auto-renewal of the subscription by going to your account settings on the {1} after purchase.
